title: How to Bake Cocoa Fudge Cake

steps.headline: Grease and flour a 9 x 13-inch oblong pan.
Sift together into mixing bowl the flour, sugar, baking soda, salt and cocoa.
Add the shortening, buttermilk and vanilla to the flour ingredients.
Beat mixture by hand for 300 strokes or beat with a mixer for 3 minutes.
steps.description: Scrape the bowl down, if you beat the cake batter using a mixer.

steps.headline: Add eggs and beat cake batter 2 minutes more.
Pour cake batter into the prepared baking pan.
Cool cake on wire baking rack.
Frost cake with favorite chocolate icing.

text: Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Grease and flour a 9 x 13-inch oblong pan.  Sift together into mixing bowl the flour, sugar, baking soda, salt and cocoa.  Add the shortening, buttermilk and vanilla to the flour ingredients.  Beat mixture by hand for 300 strokes or beat with a mixer for 3 minutes. Scrape the bowl down, if you beat the cake batter using a mixer. Add eggs and beat cake batter 2 minutes more.  Pour cake batter into the prepared baking pan.  Bake cake 40 to 45 minutes.  Cool cake on wire baking rack.  Frost cake with favorite chocolate icing.  Finished.
